name: Retro Adventure (Bloo)
description:
! Enter the Retro Adventure! 

Where Skeletons live and Spikes MOVE! 

Help our Elf Friend escape this Dungeon and back to his friends! 

Instructions:

L or Left arrow to move left! 

R or Right arrow to move right! 

W or Space or Up arrow to Jump! 

Have Fun! 

Credits:

Brevyn - Music - Short Circuits
